snippet.title: GEON Emotions
snippet.description:
GEON: the emotional sport-event of the future, get ready to become the next famous master of GEON.

Do you have what it takes to collect more emotional energy than your strong opponent in this highly addictive and psychadelic multiplayer-arcade-game?

You and your opponent take control of emotionally charged cubes and play on each side of the grid surface to collect the 'Pellets' and charge up your cube.
Once fully charged you will have enough energy to cross over to the opposite side of the surface and deposit your energy into your opponent's goal in a face-to-face battle.

Geon is a game that will appear on your Xbox Live Arcade this year (2007)

Lets Roll!
